CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT( Status__c ), "DO NOT PAY", IF( TEXT(Owner:User.ROOFPRO_Portal_Language__c)= "Quebec French" , "a été refusée. Vous recevrez prochainement les informations d’Integrated Marketing Technologies", "was declined. You will receive information from Integrated Marketing Technologies shortly."), TEXT( Status__c ))
CustomField.label: Status Description
